body: Any structure standing on open ground takes 50 points of damage. A collapsing structure deals 4d6 points of bludgeoning damage to creatures inside it (Reflex DC 5 half), and the creatures inside are pinned beneath the rubble.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Bard/Masterpieces/The Depths of the Mountain/Effect/Structure
name: Structure
